title: Season hard reset
body: So, as the title suggests, seeing as witht he whole dynamic queue and all the fuck ups for ranked this season had, is there gonna be a hard reset? or is it just gonna be a really shit one again next season.

replies.body: You will only get a soft reset, nothing more nothing less, if you are good enough you will climb reguardless of your performance in season 6.
^ pretty much this and for these exact reasons.
